name: Roll It (Herof123, Ratainen)
description:
Made for GMTK Gamejam 2022.

In this game you place blocks and jump pads to guide your dice to a basket, with a right number.

CONTROLS:

LEFT CLICK TO PLACE 

RIGHT CLICK TO DELETE

BUTTONS:

GREEN MARK TO START 

RED X TO STOP

TWO BLUE ARROWS TO TOGGLE 2X SPEED

BLOCK AND JUMPPAD IMAGE TO SELECT THAT
